CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, EX REL. IRWIN EISENSTEIN, Petitioner v. CITY OF NEW YORK, NEW YORK, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:17 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GIDEON A. SCHOR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL T. REPHEN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY B. WALL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GIDEON A. SCHOR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:14 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
